Created page with "{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_DragonFlap'''
(''no parameter'')
Calls [[A_DragonFlight]] and has a 94% chance of playing the sound "DragonWingflap" on the Body channel...."
revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_DragonFlap'''
(''no parameter'')
Calls [[A_DragonFlight]] and has a 94% chance of playing the sound "DragonWingflap" on the Body channel. Otherwise it plays the actor's {{Property|ActiveSound}}. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Dragon}} and derived classes.
